document_data.name: Order of Rainbow Monks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of Rainbow Monks''' were a religious organization found in the [[Hordelands]].{{cite book/Storm Riders|27}}
document_data.Activities: The rainbow monks worshiped [[Byubo]]. They also helped travelers passing through the region along the treacherous route.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Order of Rainbow Monks were based deep within the [[Katakoro Shan]] mountain range where the [[Gogrus River|Gogrus]] and [[Akundi River|Akundi]] rivers met at [[Rainbow Falls]].
